sentences.english: Do you know when the mountain goats give birth?
sentences.chinese: 山岩间的野山羊几时生产，你知道吗？

sentences.english: Elijah went before the people and said, 'How long will you waver between two opinions?
sentences.chinese: 以利亚前来对众民说，你们心持两意要到几时呢？

sentences.english: O Lord, how long will you look on?
sentences.chinese: 主阿，你看着不理，要到几时呢？

sentences.english: All man's efforts are for his mouth, yet his appetite is never satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 众人的劳碌都为口腹，但心里几时满足过。
索尼埃几时和你联络的？

sentences.english: Oh! then -- some time or other we shall be happy to hear you.
sentences.chinese: 噢，几时我们倒想要听一听。

sentences.english: Two deep middle when military training?
Would all of you throw him down- this leaning wall, this tottering fence?
sentences.chinese: 如同毁坏歪斜的墙，将倒的壁，要到几时呢？

sentences.english: And when do you go back to Moscow?
A new wine cup last year old pavilions, weather. When the sunset?
sentences.chinese: 一曲新词酒一杯，去年天气旧亭台。夕阳西下几时回？

sentences.english: But when has the west ever thought that free trade was harmful for Africa?
sentences.chinese: 然而西方国家几时考虑过自由贸易给非洲带来的损害？

sentences.english: When should the children of the faithful be baptised ?
sentences.chinese: 奉教人的孩子几时该领洗？

sentences.english: When can I go and meet with God?
How long will I endure the insincere prayers of your spineless subjects?
sentences.chinese: 我忍受你那些没种的臣民虚假的祷告，要到几时呢？

sentences.english: When he has a big silver solution, and brother to eat his silver to make this leakage.
sentences.chinese: 他却几时有一锭大银解了，兄长吃他赚漏了这个银去。

definition: did I ever ...? (or "did he ever ...?" etc)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to stay for a long period
